EmailTemplate.description: Help us invest in your MathWorks training success - L3
EmailTemplate.name: L3 Enrollment Training Survey - English
EmailTemplate.subject: Did MathWorks training change how you use our tools? Tell us more!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Enrollment__c.Enrollee_Name__c},
Thank you for attending training from the MathWorks. Our goal is to ensure your success using MATLAB, Simulink, and associated tools for your applications.
We are dedicated to continuously improving your learning experience, and your feedback is important to us. Kindly take a moment to help us understand your change in behavior after the training by taking this survey, which should only take about five (5) minutes of your time.
Training Knowledge Transfer Survey
Thank you in advance for your time investment, and we look forward to meeting your learning needs in the future.
Sincerely,
Craig Santos Training Business Manager The MathWorks, Inc. Craig.Santos@mathworks.com
To update your address, send e-mail to: service@mathworks.com
Â© 2017 The MathWorks, Inc. MATLAB and Simulink are registered trademarks of The MathWorks, Inc. See mathworks.com/trademarks for a list of additional trademarks. Other product or brand names may be trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders.
OPT-OUT: Click on the link to remove this e-mail address from the MathWorks commercial electronic mailing list.
